thread.title_full: Bangalore and Goa - Most happening tourist destinations

author: Naresh raju-2015-10-19T05:39:23-0400
title: Bangalore and Goa - Most happening tourist destinations
text:
“Garden City”, it is beautiful place with gardens and parks which is breath catching. There are many popular gardens which must be visited during the trip to Bangalore Lal Bagh, Cubbon Park, Vidhan Soudha and Lumbini Gardens. Other attractions, which can be visited in Bangalore are Bangalore Palace and Tipu Sultan's Palace. And the famous picnic spot Ulsoor lake is a must visit place. You can also visit ISKCON temple of lord Krishna. Bannerghatta National park which is close to Bangalore can also be visited, where you can spot some beautiful birds and animals. 
‘silicon valley of India’. Bangalore is a city with different cultures and people from all over the country. Bangalore to Goa flights can be booked online. You can also purchase Bangalore to Goa tour packages which includes flights from Bangalore to Goa, Goa sightseeing and stay at best hotels in Goa. 

Holiday in Goa: Goa is hot and happening tourist destination in India 
, road and air. Bangalore to Goa flights are available throughout the year and the flight tickets can be booked online.   
flights from Bangalore to Goa and flights, bus from Bangalore to Goa can be booked @ in.via.com .
